TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox/SelectedObjectCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 中所選項目的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of selected items in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會儲存在選取的項目。The class stores the selected items in the . 項目儲存在內含的項目類別。The items stored in the are items contained within the class. 類別會儲存所有項目顯示在。The class stores all items displayed in the . 下表會如何的範例儲存的項目以及其在範例中的選取項目狀態。The following table is an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states within an example . |索引Index|項目Item|在清單方塊中的選取狀態Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |00|object1object1|未選取Unselected| |11|object2object2|已選取Selected| |22|object3object3|未選取Unselected| |33|object4object4|已選取Selected| |44|object5object5|已選取Selected| 根據如上表所示下, 表示範如何會出現。Based on the demonstrated in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|選取的項目從 ObjectCollectionSelected item from ObjectCollection| |-----------|-----------------------------------------| |00|object2object2| |11|object4object4| |22|object5object5| 您可以使用這個類別的方法與屬性來執行各種工作的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法可讓您判斷是否將項目從類別是隸屬。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道項目位於集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷在特定的項目內for便會儲存在。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where a specific item within the for the is stored within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您判斷是否將項目從類別會儲存在選取的項目成員。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the selected items stored in the . 您可以使用這來判斷如果在多個選取項目中的特定項目已選取。You can use this to determine if a specific item in a multiple-selection is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來結合成單一陣列的多個集合從選取的項目。You can use this method to combine the selected items from multiple collections into a single array.

summary.span: 取得集合中的項目數目。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您判斷在選取的項目數目。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the . 逐一查看集合的值時，您可以再使用此值，您必須提供執行迴圈的反覆項目的數目。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 除非的屬性設為`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`，這個屬性一律會傳回值為零 (0) 或一 （1） 取決於您是否有選取的項目。Unless the property of the is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, this property always returns a value of zero (0) or one (1) depending on whether you have a selected item.
